content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello, Baihu Li. Thank you for considering my apartment in Mannheim. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you give me an initial offer?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Baihu Li. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 600 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and am willing to consider a lower rental price if you are interested. What is your counteroffer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.

Thanks for your help, Mister Heine. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you, Baihu Li. I am glad that we were able to reach an agreement on the rental price. I will prepare the lease agreement for you to sign, and you can return it to me as soon as possible. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. Have a nice day!
name: Heinrich Heine
